metadata.Title: CVE-2022-21151 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Processor optimization removal or modification of security-critical code for some Intel(R) Processors may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable information disclosure via local access. Alysa Milburn, Jason Brandt, Avishai Redelman and Nir Lavi discovered that some Intel processors improperly optimised security-critical code. A local attacker could possibly use this to expose sensitive information.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Alysa Milburn, Jason Brandt, Avishai Redelman and Nir Lavi

criterions.comment: intel-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'early microcode loading not allowed').
